thread.title: Plano woman killed after minivan crosses median, collides with her car in Frisco
thread.title_full: Plano woman killed after minivan crosses median, collides with her car in Frisco

author: Valerie Wigglesworth
title: Plano woman killed after minivan crosses median, collides with her car in Frisco
text:
Plano woman killed after minivan crosses median, collides with her car in Frisco Filed under Frisco at Get Daily Dallas News Headlines Sign Up Get Unlimited Digital Access Your first month is less than a dollar. $0.99 for first 4 weeks Subscribe Now 
An 85-year-old Plano woman was killed Friday after her vehicle was struck by another one that had crossed the median on Preston Road on Friday afternoon. 
Frisco police say that a minivan was traveling southbound on Preston Road near Camfield Road at about 12:37 p.m. It crossed the median and collided with a passenger car headed northbound on Preston Road, police say. 
Ruby Kesner, who was in the car driving north, was transported to a local hospital, where she was pronounced dead. Two people in the minivan were transported to the hospital with non-life-threatening injuries. 
Preston Road was closed to traffic for several hours Friday while police investigated. The cause of the crash is still under investigation. No charges have been filed. View Comments
